entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:39 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 9:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: SSW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
